mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.* FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`cnt`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`cnt`) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`cnt`) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbsuth`.`cnt`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_statistics_user_total_hour as `tbsuth`
GROUP BY
`tbsuth`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicStatisticsUserTotalHourPo.havingClause}
